item.title: 在 3 月 5 日举行的 "超级星期二 "初选中，乔-拜登总统和他的前任、共和党人唐纳德-特朗普在 16 个州和 1 个地区的初选中都大获全胜，各自赢得了本党的多数提名。
item.description:
President Joe Biden and his predecessor, Republican Donald Trump, have each won a majority of their party’s nominations as both were heavily favored in each of the 16 states and one territory holding Super Tuesday primaries on March 5. pic.twitter.com/OP52rDrLKJ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 贾森-帕尔默（Jason Palmer），一位之前名不见经传的候选人，赢得了美属萨摩亚的民主党党团会议。这是乔-拜登总统在 "超级星期二 "竞选中唯一的失利。
item.description:
Jason Palmer, a previously unknown candidate, won the Democratic caucus in American Samoa.

It was the only loss for President Joe Biden in a slate of Super Tuesday races. https://t.co/1KtNHaiMR1 pic.twitter.com/opsHRbTPFQ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 共和黨人 Steve Garvey 晉級加州參議員大選。他的对手将是民主党众议员亚当-希夫。
item.description:
Republican Steve Garvey advances to the general election for U.S. Senate in California. He will face Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff. https://t.co/ZHFfoVq1u0

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 "超级星期二 "在马阿拉歌（Mar-a-Lago）发表的 20 分钟演讲中几乎没有庆祝活动。相反，他重点谈到了自己执政期间的一些时刻，有时还对国家的未来做出了黑暗的预测，尤其是在拜登的领导下。
item.description:
Former President Donald Trump offered little celebration during his 20-minute speech at Mar-a-Lago on Super Tuesday.

Instead, he focused on moments from his administration and at times, shared a dark prediction of the nation's future, especially under Biden. pic.twitter.com/HJrLYAxv3C

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）将提前到11月的选举中决定谁将填补已故黛安-范斯坦（Dianne Feinstein）担任了三十年之久的美国参议员席位。
item.description:
U.S. Rep. Adam Schiff is advancing to a November election to decide who will fill the U.S. Senate seat held for three decades by the late Dianne Feinstein. https://t.co/aC1m6goCQ7

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）在佛蒙特州的 "超级星期二 "初选中赢得了第二场胜利，尽管她在其他地方输给了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）。
item.description:
BREAKING: Nikki Haley takes her second primary win, grabbing a Super Tuesday victory in Vermont despite losing elsewhere to Donald Trump. https://t.co/bSi7zQwvaG

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 大满贯冠军西蒙娜-哈勒普（Simona Halep）赢得兴奋剂案上诉，获准恢复网球运动

item.title: 乔-拜登总统在 "超级星期二 "席卷了民主党的所有竞选活动--除了美属萨摩亚。他在那里输给了一位以前名不见经传的候选人杰森-帕尔默（Jason Palmer）。
item.description:
President Joe Biden was sweeping every Democratic contest on Super Tuesday — except for American Samoa. He fell short there to a previously unknown candidate named Jason Palmer. https://t.co/KBYZd3QLRf

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院法官萨拉-斯图尔特（Sarah Stewart）是裁定冷冻胚胎根据州法律被视为儿童的法院多数成员之一，她赢得了共和党对阿拉巴马州首席大法官的提名。
item.description:
Alabama Supreme Court Justice Sarah Stewart, who was part of a court majority that ruled frozen embryos are considered children under a state law, has won the Republican nomination for Alabama chief justice. https://t.co/GRgGh8P1wr

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 标志性的老西部风滚草滚滚而来，覆盖了盐湖城郊区的部分地区
item.description:

item.title: 乔-拜登总统和前总统唐纳德-特朗普是再次赢得各自党派连任提名的压倒性热门人选。但他们还不是 "推定提名人"。
item.description:
President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump are the overwhelming favorites to once again win their parties’ nomination for a second term. But they’re not the “presumptive nominees” just yet. https://t.co/zagqZ5OHp2

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024
